meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room 6ES, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the March 25, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment Opportunities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on potential development and redevelopment opportunities for city real estate.

agenda_items.title: FY 2024-25 Planned Budget: Office of Government Affairs
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the planned budget for the Office of Government Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Monthly Update on Internal Audit Reports
agenda_items.description: Update on internal audit reports released between March 16, 2024 and April 12, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Owner Controlled Insurance Program (OCIP) Broker Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion on broker services for the Owner Controlled Insurance Program.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item - Dallas Water Utilities Billing System
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the upcoming agenda item regarding the Dallas Water Utilities billing system.

agenda_items.title: Audit of Small Business Center Minority and Women-Owned Business Enterprises
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the audit of minority and women-owned business enterprises.

agenda_items.title: Budget Accountability Report as of February 28, 2024
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the budget accountability report.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report as of March 31, 2024
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the technology accountability report.

agenda_items.title: GPFM Two Month Forecast
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the two-month forecast for the Government Performance and Financial Management.
